channel.title: Home on Kubernetes Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Kubernetes Introduction

item.title: Installation
item.description: We will use Docker For Desktop which is free for smaller companies and costs a small fee per developer for large companies. It supports both Mac and Windows. Install Docker For Desktop on Mac Install Docker For Desktop on Windows And then enable Kubernetes. Verify that everything is set up and running by running the following command in a terminal and check that you get a similar output:
